name: MKScaleView
desc: A specialized view that displays the current scale information for its associated map.

items.name: init(mapView: MKMapView?)
items.desc: Creates a scale view and associates it with the specified map view.

items.name: var mapView: MKMapView?
items.desc: The map view that provides the scale information to the scale view.

items.name: var scaleVisibility: MKFeatureVisibility
items.desc: The visibility of the scale view.

items.name: var legendAlignment: MKScaleView.Alignment
items.desc: The alignment of the distance information in the scale view.

items.name: enum MKScaleView.Alignment
items.desc: Constants indicating whether measurements begin at the leading or trailing edge of the view.
